[docs]def discrete_entropy_samples(samples):
    '''
    Entropy is in nats
    '''
    counts = defaultdict(int)
    for s in samples:
        counts[s]+=1
    return discrete_entropy_distribution(counts.values())



[docs]def discrete_entropy_distribution(counts):
    total = np.sum(counts)
    return np.sum(np.log(counts)*counts)/total - np.log(total)
